title: Update regarding Velocity Motors
story_body:
Velocity Motors (VELO) provided a routine update on its corporate activities.

As of 2023-02-15 08:00:00 EST, Velocity Motors confirmed the appointment of Emily J. Lee as Director of Marketing, effective 2023-02-01. Ms. Lee will oversee the company's marketing strategy and initiatives.

In a separate development, Velocity Motors announced the launch of its 2023 Sustainability Report, available on the company's website as of 2023-02-10. The report outlines the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance for the fiscal year 2022, highlighting progress toward its sustainability goals.

Additionally, Velocity Motors reported that it has renewed its partnership with the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) to support the development of autonomous vehicle safety standards. The partnership, which commenced in 2020, aims to promote public safety and advance the deployment of autonomous vehicles on public roads.

These updates reflect the company's ongoing commitment to its business operations, sustainability initiatives, and industry partnerships. No further information is available at this time.
